entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
